result.title: WT!?? Mother of cheating!!
result.content:
Hello Codeforces, I want to report cheater from Codeforces Round #405 (rated, Div. 2, based on VK Cup 2017 Round 1). I want to thank authors of round too, great round!

Firstly, our cheater is anantheparty, it is easy to see that with looking submissions for problem E (here). wxh_ak named fake account sent solution in 2017-03-18 20:23:02 and anantheparty sent in 2017-03-18 20:23:15, 13 second after. Hmm, you can think this is just coincidence. Let's see codes. Firstly, anantheparty's submission. Ok, normal code. Now we are going to see interesting part! Look wxh_ak's submission from here (WARNING!! YOU CAN SCARE!!). I can feel you said WT!? :D. YES, THAT'S MOTHER OF CHEATING!!. I don't know how he did that (with program or just replacing :P) and I don't want to know :D. I tried to translate some part of code (especially last part), they are same, you can check too. This will be new idea for cheaters :P. But, guys, please don't do that!! Cheating will not give you anything besides rating!

I hope he will apologize and won't cheat again.

Thanks for reading. Good luck!

Sorry for poor English.
